t: How to Protect Your Brand on Amazon
s: February 2, 2024 - Big brands on Amazon are not plagued by counterfeiting just because they are famous. They also face extensive infringement because they usually offer generic daily-use products that are easy to copy. Therefore, one way to protect your brand and product from counterfeiters is to deal in items that are only manufactured on a tailored order and can’t be easily found as white-label items.
